field.label: Enable DNSBL and RPZ
field.help: This will enable the use of DNS Blocklists for ADs, Malware, or both.

field.label: Type of DNSBL
field.help: Select which kind of DNSBL you want to use.

field.label: Whitelist Domains
field.help: List of domains to whitelist. It will add a entry for the domains itself and all sub domains.

field.label: Enable Local RPZ Zone
field.help: This will enable a local RPZ Zone.

field.label: Enable Youtube Adult Restrictions
field.help: This will force safe Youtube browsing.

field.label: Enable Strict Bing Search
field.help: This will force safe search when using Bing.
